features.name: Orders Management
features.description: Manage new part requests and initial order staging with bulk import, editing, and attachment support.

features.name: Main Sheet
features.description: Track part status through lifecycle (Pending → Arrived → Available → Call List) with auto-move workflow.

features.name: Booking System
features.description: Premium calendar interface for scheduling customer appointments with multi-customer VIN grouping.

features.name: Call List
features.description: Manage customer contact queue with call status tracking and communication logging.

features.name: Archive & History
features.description: Maintain 48-hour historical retention with archived reasons for compliance.

features.name: API Endpoint - Trigger Backup
features.description: Triggers GitHub Actions workflow to backup reports.

features.name: Data Grid
features.description: Advanced data grid functionality with sorting, filtering, and virtualization.

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Cross-tab search across VIN, Customer Name, Part Number, and Company.
